[[File:Festive Skin Pack.png|thumb|Key art]]

The '''Festive Skin Pack''' is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 24 Christmas-themed skins. All skins included in this pack were added to the [[Holiday Skin Pack 2015]] for ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'', which owners of the Festive Skin Pack on {{editions|xbone|switch|ps4}} received for free during the migration to ''Bedrock Edition''.
